actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration (without written report).

official_title: An original resolution temporarily suspending paragraph 1 of rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to permit a photograph of the Senate in session.

summary.text: Suspends temporarily rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to allow the United States Capitol Historical Society to photograph the Senate in actual session.

titles.title: An original resolution temporarily suspending paragraph 1 of rule IV of the Rules for the Regulation of the Senate Wing of the United States Capitol to permit a photograph of the Senate in session.
